section.name: Introduction
section.p: The Policy toolkit is a set of utility classes that will read in an xml file that describes a code-based security policy xml descriptor. The descriptor contains the same information as is present in the java.policy file but described in an xml file. This toolkit is also capable of validating a descriptor to make sure it is well formed and follows some basic semantic rules. Please see the sample descriptor for an example of the format that the Policy toolkit supports.
All Spice jars are held in the http://spice.sf.net/maven repository for Maven usage.
